metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3541 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in libxml2. Exponential entity expansion attack itspossible bypassing all existing protection mechanisms and leading to denialof service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-6.7
libxml2-utils - 2.9.10+dfsg-6.7
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-6.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.10+dfsg-6.7').
